message.content: {"given_definition_quality":65,"better_definition":"to take or give a test; to examine","sentence":"他要考试。","image_prompt":"A young student sitting at a basic school desk, holding a pencil, looking slightly nervous as a teacher hands out a test paper. The scene is inside a simple, bright classroom with minimal details and sunlight streaming through the window. Render everything in a soft apocalypse animation style, showing subtle hints of overgrown plants creeping in from the window, blending everyday life with a gentle, dreamlike post-apocalyptic atmosphere.","sentence_translation":"He is going to take a test."}
